intro: Exciting adventures of Leo and Tig.
description:
The game "Leo and Tig," based on the animated series of the same name, takes you on an adventure with the show's charming characters: Leo the Amur leopard, Tig the playful tiger, Mila the weasel, Yara the agile lynx, Kuba the cheerful pig, Martik the squirrel, Kino the eaglet, and Willy the brave bunny.

Each character has their own unique abilities that help them overcome any challenge! The game features seven stunningly beautiful locations, where a story about friendship, mutual assistance, and caring for nature unfolds.

Leo and Tig: Taiga is a captivating arcade game featuring your favorite characters.

A unique world set in the taiga, where players can complete engaging quests and solve challenging puzzles. Unlock the unique abilities of the animal characters and let them explore beautiful places that hold many secrets.
